string.value: #b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k says he's finished analyzing the clues. Let's talk to him.

Although #b#p1032001##k in Ellinia has received a request to further investigate the matter, he doesn't like talking to strangers.\n\n You may be able to find what he likes, however, if you go see #b#@1092002:##k in the #b#m120000300##k. Let's rush over!
#b#@1092002:##k says he'll make something #b#@1032001:##k likes. Let's go find him at the #b#m120000300##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'A Special Wine' as next quest.
I have looked into this all night, and I can tell you that this isn't just a regular Iron Fragment. It's cast with a magic spell, but I don't know much about magic.
The only thing I can tell you with absolute certainty is that it exudes a powerful force. I believe there is one way to find out more about this.
If you see #b#p1032001##k in #b#m101000000##k, you'll be able to find out the specifics of this magic spell. The only thing is that he doesn't particularly enjoy seeing strangers.
First, head over to see #b#p1092002##k in the #b#m120000300##k. Since he frequently visits Ellinia, he'll know what #b#p1032001##k likes.
What? If I were you, I'd be curious!
Welcome. So, I hear you're trying to go see #b#p1032001##k in #b#m101000000##k.
Then you've come to the right place! I'll tell you how.\n\nTalk to me again.
